reqs:
Location: Room CBH 3402A/B, Centre for Brain Health
Course Co-ordinator - Nick Swindale
Normally restricted to students in Neuroscience Graduate Program. All other students must obtain permission from the course director or Neuroscience chairman.
description: Continuation of NRSC 500 with emphasis on the integrative functions of the brain, behaviour, and selected neural disorders. Permission of Neuroscience Chair is required. Normally to be taken in conjunction with NRSC 500.
